name: Crab Roe Tofu
desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.

customize.name: Recipe: Crab Roe Tofu
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Crab Roe Tofu.

customize.name: Crab Roe
customize.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

customize.name: Tofu
customize.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

customize.name: Delicious Crab Roe Tofu
customize.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. The tofu is so tender that it might break if you blew on a spoonful of it. Each granule of the crab roe is plump and filled with crab oil that oozes out onto your lips the moment you have a single bite. Chewing is not needed at all. The food travels down your gullet in a flash, leaving nothing but the memory of its fresh flavor.

customize.name: Suspicious Crab Roe Tofu
customize.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Even the freshest crab roe cannot mask the taste of over-aged tofu. Crushing it up with your chopsticks and mixing it into white rice is all you can do to force it down your gullet.

customize.name: Yanfei
customize.desc: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

customize.name: "My Way"
customize.desc: Yanfei's specialty is Crab Roe Tofu done to an incredible degree of regularity. Its dimensions and flavor are all faithfully rendered according to the "Crab Roe Tofu Laws" in the recipe, with not a single letter omitted.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.
